biotools.summary: Advanced software tool for obtaining alignment-independent 3D quantitative structure-activity relationships. The program starts from a set of structures, computing highly relevant 3D maps of interaction energies between the molecule and chemical probes (GRID based Molecular Interaction Fields, or MIFs).

bioschemas.name: Pentacle
